attributes.action: UK Citizens living abroad to sign a petition Donald Trump to make a state visit.
attributes.background: I am a British citizen living in America, I wish to be allowed by the U.K. Government to sign a petition allowing President Donald Trump to make a state visit to the U.K.

rejection.details:
British citizens living abroad can start and sign petitions. 

You may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178844
